about_the_game:
This Snow Day Pack includes 26 wintery Clothing Items, 2 wintery Wigs, 8 wintery Furniture Items, 1 wintery Mount, and 1 wintery Pet.


It might be cold outside, but this set will be sure to warm your heart! The Snow Day Pack has 38 winter-themed items that will make your farm feel like a true winter wonderland.

Pack includes:
  • Snow Day Furniture Set: Snow Day Bed, Snow Day Bookshelf, Snow Day Chair, Snow Day Lamp, Snow Day End Table, Snow Day Rug, Snow Day Couch, and Snow Day Table
  • Snowy Crown Set: Snowflake Hair Piece and Snow Day Beauty Tiara
  • Warm Snow Day Outfit Set: Snow Day Long Coat, Snow Day Pants, Snow Day Shawl, and Snow Day Thermal Pants
  • Chilled Snow Day Outfit Set: Snow Day Windswept Wig, Ice Fist Helmet, Snow Day Hoodie, and Snow Day Baggy Pants
  • Comfy Snow Day Outfit Set: Snow Day Dress and Snow Day Sleeves
  • Cute Snow Day Outfit Set: Snow Day Crop Top and Snow Day Long Skirt
  • Cozy Snow Day Outfit Set: Snow Day Beanie, Snow Day Hood, Snow Day Horns Hat, Snow Day Cozy Shirt and Snow Day Buttoned Skirt
  • Ice Outfit Set: Ice Spike Buns Wig, Snow Day Ninja Top, Snow Day Ninja Pants and Snow Day Ninja Scarf
  • Bundled Up Snow Day Outfit Set: Snow Day V Coat, Snow Day Puff Ball Mittens, Snow Day Casual Pants, Snow Day Sweater Dress, and Snow Day School Dress
  • Snow Leopard Mount
  • Grimble, the Snow Buddy Pet
